description: Kuhl broke all the rules when designing The Law™ pant. Kuhl's heavyweight, canvas weave is the definition of tough while still maintaining flexibility and comfort. Reinforced from the upper thigh to below the knee, this premium work pant can take whatever you dish out. From a hard day on the job to a night on the town, anything is possible with The Law™ on your side.
name: Kuhl The Law Pants, 36" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: two front hand, one coin, two back, one stealth cell phone, one 3D and one zipper on 3D pocket
